title: Allows juvenile offenders be prosecuted as an adult for certain felony gun possession offenses
summary: Allows a juvenile offender accused of certain criminal possession of a weapon offenses, reckless manslaughter and attempts to commit certain felonies to be tried as an adult; changes the definition of "juvenile offender" to include criminal possession of a loaded firearm, machine gun or explosive, reckless manslaughter, and attempts to commit certain serious felonies.
